title: Enrich landing page with additional generated static imagery

requirements.summary: Add four new generated static images and place them across multiple landing page sections to increase visual richness while keeping the warm, professional theme and responsive behavior.
acceptanceCriteria: New image files are added under frontend/public/assets/generated with the exact filenames specified in imageRequirements.required.
Landing page (frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx) renders the new images in at least 3 different sections (not only the hero/fees sections) and remains responsive on mobile and desktop.
All newly added tags include descriptive English alt text.

No existing required poster images are removed or renamed (opportunity-hero-poster.dim_1600x900.png, promo-poster-1.dim_1080x1080.png, promo-poster-2.dim_1080x1080.png, apply-banner.dim_1600x600.png).

file_operations.description: Add the required generated static asset: Abstract warm gradient texture with subtle education motifs (warm-texture-1.dim_1600x900.png).
Add the required generated static asset: Illustrative icon set tile: graduation cap, globe, chat bubble, checklist (education-icons-tile.dim_1200x1200.png).
Add the required generated static asset: Minimal line-art illustration of a person working from home at a desk with laptop (work-from-home-illustration.dim_1400x900.png).
Add the required generated static asset: Wide section divider banner with geometric shapes, warm palette, no text (section-divider-1.dim_1600x400.png).

Wire the new generated images into the landing page as static elements (served from frontend/public/assets/generated) and distribute them across at least 3 different sections beyond the existing hero/fees imagery. Use: frontend/public/assets/generated/warm-texture-1.dim_1600x900.png as a subtle decorative/background-adjacent image in an early section; frontend/public/assets/generated/education-icons-tile.dim_1200x1200.png as a supporting visual near a content block (e.g., overview/about platform); frontend/public/assets/generated/work-from-home-illustration.dim_1400x900.png inside the Work From Home section as a complementary illustration; and frontend/public/assets/generated/section-divider-1.dim_1600x400.png as a responsive full-width divider between two major sections. Ensure all new images have descriptive English alt text, are responsive (appropriate sizing, stacking on mobile), and do not remove/rename existing required poster images already referenced on the page.
